thread.title: Suit: Court illegally jails those who can’t pay fines
thread.title_full: Suit: Court illegally jails those who can’t pay fines

title: Suit: Court illegally jails those who can’t pay fines
text:
Published By: Las Vegas Sun - Today 
Seven people have sued Mississippi's capital city, saying its municipal court illegally jailed them because they couldn't pay court fines....
